p: It is diversified in different locations such as countrysides, savannah, forest lands, dry woodlands, and riverbanks. It is drought-resistant with an altitude requirement of 900–2,000 masl, mean annual temperature of 14–30°C, and mean annual rainfall of 300–1 250 mm. It prefers poor and dry soil, including clay, clay loam, loamy sand, sandy clay loam, and sand [ 17].
